solution_line_template: In four years, Hans will be {hans_current_age}+{years_in_future}=<<{hans_current_age}+{years_in_future}={hans_age_in_future}>>{hans_age_in_future} years old.
Then Annika will be {hans_age_in_future}*{annika_age_multiplier}=<<{hans_age_in_future}*{annika_age_multiplier}={annika_age_in_future}>>{annika_age_in_future} years old.
So Annika right now is {annika_age_in_future}-{years_in_future}=<<{annika_age_in_future}-{years_in_future}={annika_current_age}>>{annika_current_age} years old.
